availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Napoleon Bonapart Cheatham (Cumberland County, Kentucky, county clerk)

body.p: Cumberland County, Kentucky, county clerk. Cumberland County native. Married to Lucy A. Cheatham. Father of John T. Cheatham, Samuel D. Cheatham, Elisha G. Cheatham, and Mary I. W. Cheatham. Clerk of the Cumberland County Court in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Cumberland County, Town of Burkesville District No. 1, p. 73; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Barren County, Glasgow, p. 18; Find A Grave, "Napoleon Bonapart Cheatham" (1817-1903)," Memorial #91315962, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=91315962&ref=acom (accessed March 31, 2017).
